title: The Exorcist: Believer
description: When two girls disappear into the woods and return possessed, their families confront pure evil.

title: Talk to Me
description: A group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand - with terrifying consequences.

title: Evil Dead Rise
description: A twisted tale of two estranged sisters whose reunion is cut short by demonic forces.

title: Smile
description: After witnessing a bizarre traumatic incident, a doctor becomes convinced something supernatural is haunting her.

title: The Nun II
description: 1956 France - a priest is murdered and evil is spreading. Sister Irene faces Valak again.

title: M3GAN
description: A robotics engineer creates an AI doll that becomes violently protective of her orphaned niece.

title: Barbarian
description: A woman discovers the rental home she booked is already occupied by a stranger with a terrifying secret.

title: X
description: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film on a rural Texas farm.

title: Pearl
description: Trapped on her family's isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under her mother's watch.

title: The Black Phone
description: A kidnapped boy receives calls on a disconnected phone from the killer's previous victims.

title: Hereditary
description: After the death of her secretive grandmother, a woman's family begins unraveling terrifying secrets.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: The Babadook
description: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book manifests their worst fears.

title: It Follows
description: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness grows into outright terror.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

title: The Witch
description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

title: Hush
description: A deaf writer must fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her isolated home.

title: The Ritual
description: A group of college friends reunite for a trip to a forest in Sweden, where they encounter a menacing presence.

title: Autopsy of Jane Doe
description: A father and son coroner team receive a mysterious unidentified corpse with no apparent cause of death.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: Midsommar
description: A couple travels to Sweden to visit a rural hometown's fabled mid-summer festival, but what begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into chaos.

title: The Invisible Man
description: When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax.

title: His House
description: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but soon experience strange phenomena in their new British home.

title: The Night House
description: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets while living alone in the lakeside home he built for her.

title: Malignant
description: A woman begins to have terrifying visions of brutal murders, only to discover they're actually happening in real life.

title: Titane
description: A woman with a metal plate in her head from a childhood car accident descends into criminality and bizarre body horror.

title: Annabelle
description: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.
cast: Annabelle Wallis, Ward Horton, Alfre Woodard

title: It
description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
cast: Bill Skarsgård, Jaeden Martell, Finn Wolfhard

title: Terrifier 2
description: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to the timid town of Miles County to terrorize a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.
